name: Bug Bugs For Good
description:
Bug Bugs for Good Controls In 20XX...

Tech companies continue to pollute the environment to make the world a better place - until they, the Bugs, stand up and bug them all!

In this stealth/puzzle game, you play as a Bug and crack all the servers in a tech company, while avoiding its security robot, Debuggers.

Credits
  • coding (Unity), 3D models (MagicaVoxel), sfx (Bfxr) and bgm (Soundtrap) by myshmeh
  • amazing cover image (Clip Studio) by yui

- A GameOff2021 entry!
